trans-unit.source: This topic describes various setup pages relating to Components in the cc|project, Administration menu.

seg-source.mrk: This topic describes various setup pages relating to Components in the cc|project, Administration menu.

trans-unit.source: The Component Type can be used alternative to the Type field in the job calculation line. The structure of the Component Types is individual.

seg-source.mrk: The Component Type can be used alternative to the Type field in the job calculation line.
The structure of the Component Types is individual.

trans-unit.source: Instead of an Item, a component type can be used with more details, such as Electronics or Mechanism. Different types (e.g. items and resources) can be merged into one Component Type, such as Service Items and Services.

seg-source.mrk: Instead of an Item, a component type can be used with more details, such as Electronics or Mechanism.
Different types (e.g. items and resources) can be merged into one Component Type, such as Service Items and Services.

trans-unit.source: The Component Type code can be assigned to Items, Resources (Services and Traveling) and General Components.

seg-source.mrk: The Component Type code can be assigned to Items, Resources (Services and Traveling) and General Components.

trans-unit.source: All components (items, services and general components) can be structured and confined hierarchically by setting up Component Groups.

seg-source.mrk: All components (items, services and general components) can be structured and confined hierarchically by setting up Component Groups.

trans-unit.source: A component group hierarchy can be created by clicking Sub Groups on the ribbon.

seg-source.mrk: A component group hierarchy can be created by clicking Sub Groups on the ribbon.

trans-unit.source: : Pipes sub groups opened from Component Groups main page

seg-source.mrk: : Pipes sub groups opened from Component Groups main page

trans-unit.source: Component groups can be used calculation-wide. An overall component list is available in the Job Budget Calculation view by leaving the Type field blank and using the lookup in the No. field.

seg-source.mrk: Component groups can be used calculation-wide.
An overall component list is available in the Job Budget Calculation view by leaving the Type field blank and using the lookup in the No.

trans-unit.source: : Component Groups Selection page accessed from the No. field on Job Budget Calculation view

seg-source.mrk: : Component Groups Selection page accessed from the No.
field on Job Budget Calculation view

trans-unit.source: On the Item Card, the Job FastTab includes the fields that are specific to cc|project.

seg-source.mrk: On the Item Card, the Job FastTab includes the fields that are specific to cc|project.

trans-unit.source: The fields on this FastTab are described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The fields on this FastTab are described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the default Job Calculation Group for this item.

seg-source.mrk: Identifies the default Job Calculation Group for this item.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the standard direct cost for budget calculation.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the standard direct cost for budget calculation.

trans-unit.source: Provides the ability to deactivate automatic pricing on the item. The options are:

seg-source.mrk: Provides the ability to deactivate automatic pricing on the item.

trans-unit.source: Processes are created if the calculation position is linked with a process channel. The options are:

seg-source.mrk: Processes are created if the calculation position is linked with a process channel.

trans-unit.source: Work – Processes will be created with Work and Duration

seg-source.mrk: Work – Processes will be created with Work and Duration

trans-unit.source: Lead time – Processes are created only with Duration

seg-source.mrk: Lead time – Processes are created only with Duration

trans-unit.source: Structure – Processes are created without Work and Duration

seg-source.mrk: Structure – Processes are created without Work and Duration

trans-unit.source: Indicates the default base to calculate the Realized % in job budget lines. The options are:

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the default base to calculate the Realized % in job budget lines.

trans-unit.source: Quantity – Calculation is based on quantity.

seg-source.mrk: Quantity – Calculation is based on quantity.

trans-unit.source: Cost – Calculation is based on amounts.

seg-source.mrk: Cost – Calculation is based on amounts.

trans-unit.source: Allows the setup on the Job Card to be overruled. The options are:

seg-source.mrk: Allows the setup on the Job Card to be overruled.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the default procurement channel for this item. The options are:

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the default procurement channel for this item.

trans-unit.source: If selected, procurement is handled by the Job Order document.

seg-source.mrk: If selected, procurement is handled by the Job Order document.

trans-unit.source: Default used for Job Shipment processes. The options are:

seg-source.mrk: Default used for Job Shipment processes.

trans-unit.source: Used to assign a group of components defined as a component type.

trans-unit.source: Displays the component group hierarchy for the job, as determined by the “Set Component Groups” function on the ribbon.

trans-unit.source: The cc|project-specific actions in the Job menu group on the Navigate tab are described in this section.

seg-source.mrk: The cc|project-specific actions in the Job menu group on the Navigate tab are described in this section.

trans-unit.source: Opens the Job Comment Lines page, which is used to record unstructured data, such as user-specific comments. The Comment Type determines where the comment appears.

seg-source.mrk: Opens the Job Comment Lines page, which is used to record unstructured data, such as user-specific comments.
The Comment Type determines where the comment appears.

trans-unit.source: This action contains a drop-down with the following actions:

seg-source.mrk: This action contains a drop-down with the following actions:

trans-unit.source: Set Component Groups – Assigns the component group hierarchy that was selected in the Component Groups Selection page to the Item Card.

seg-source.mrk: Set Component Groups – Assigns the component group hierarchy that was selected in the Component Groups Selection page to the Item Card.

trans-unit.source: Delete Component Groups – Clears the Component Group 1 Code – Component Group 5 Code fields on the Job FastTab.

seg-source.mrk: Delete Component Groups – Clears the Component Group 1 Code – Component Group 5 Code fields on the Job FastTab.

trans-unit.source: Services and traveling expenses are set up as resources (Type = Service and Traveling, respectively) and are used as components in budget calculation. Each can be calculated independently from a person resource.

seg-source.mrk: Services and traveling expenses are set up as resources (Type = Service and Traveling, respectively) and are used as components in budget calculation.
Each can be calculated independently from a person resource.

trans-unit.source: The cc|project-related fields and functions on the Resource Card are described in this section.

seg-source.mrk: The cc|project-related fields and functions on the Resource Card are described in this section.

trans-unit.source: Person resources are used for Responsibilities, Planning and Time Entry.

seg-source.mrk: Person resources are used for Responsibilities, Planning and Time Entry.

trans-unit.source: The fields on this FastTab are described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The fields on this FastTab are described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Identifies a work time group that can be used to assign wage groups.

seg-source.mrk: Identifies a work time group that can be used to assign wage groups.

trans-unit.source: Base Calendar Code / Job Work-Hour Template Code

seg-source.mrk: Base Calendar Code / Job Work-Hour Template Code

trans-unit.source: Together these fields assist in the person’s capacity calculation.

seg-source.mrk: Together these fields assist in the person’s capacity calculation.

trans-unit.source: Used for exporting with the MS Project interface.

seg-source.mrk: Used for exporting with the MS Project interface.

trans-unit.source: Can only be used if the jobs to which the respective filter setting applies are to be displayed in a job list.

seg-source.mrk: Can only be used if the jobs to which the respective filter setting applies are to be displayed in a job list.

trans-unit.source: The information set up on the Job Card (Home tab > Job Team) is considered.

seg-source.mrk: The information set up on the Job Card (Home tab > Job Team) is considered.

trans-unit.source: If selected, activates the Job Person Filter setting.

seg-source.mrk: If selected, activates the Job Person Filter setting.

trans-unit.source: Can only be used if those job lines should be shown to which the respective filter setting applies. This will only include the project team data defined for the job line.

seg-source.mrk: Can only be used if those job lines should be shown to which the respective filter setting applies.
This will only include the project team data defined for the job line.

trans-unit.source: If selected, activates the Job Line Person Filter setting.

seg-source.mrk: If selected, activates the Job Line Person Filter setting.

trans-unit.source: Opens the Users page, where a Microsoft Dynamics NAV user can be assigned to the resource; used to personalize the Role Center activities.

seg-source.mrk: Opens the Users page, where a Microsoft Dynamics NAV user can be assigned to the resource; used to personalize the Role Center activities.

trans-unit.source: Assigns a salesperson or purchase code to the resource; used to personalize the Role Center activities.

seg-source.mrk: Identifies a unique job journal/batch for the resource.

trans-unit.source: Every person must have a personal Journal for Time Entry.

seg-source.mrk: Every person must have a personal Journal for Time Entry.

trans-unit.source: Default for budget calculation. Defines a resource to be a milestone resource that will be considered in process planning. This is equal to general components that are marked as milestones.

trans-unit.source: Creates capacity entries for one or more resources based on Base Calendar Code and Job Work-Hour Template Code.

trans-unit.source: Opens the Vacation Entry page where an employee’s requested leave is entered and approved.

seg-source.mrk: Opens the Vacation Entry page where an employee’s requested leave is entered and approved.

trans-unit.source: General Components are components that do not have the characteristics of services or items and are ultimately settled via G/L accounts. However, the BOM Item No. field provides the ability to assign an item with a BOM to a general component for use in the job line budget (refer to topic “Entering BOMs in Job Structure” on page 1 for more information).

seg-source.mrk: General Components are components that do not have the characteristics of services or items and are ultimately settled via G/L accounts.

field provides the ability to assign an item with a BOM to a general component for use in the job line budget (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Entering Information in the.htm#_Ref383522176" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Entering BOMs in Job Structure” on page 1</MadCap:xref> for more information).

trans-unit.source: External Services are used for purchase because Resources cannot be purchased with standard Microsoft Dynamics NAV functionality.

seg-source.mrk: External Services are used for purchase because Resources cannot be purchased with standard Microsoft Dynamics NAV functionality.

trans-unit.source: External Services and External Traveling Expenses must be specified on the Procurement FastTab of the Jobs Setup page.

seg-source.mrk: External Services and External Traveling Expenses must be specified on the Procurement FastTab of the Jobs Setup page.

trans-unit.source: The General Component Card contains similar fields and functions as the Resource Card; refer to topic “Resources” on page 1 for more information.

seg-source.mrk: The General Component Card contains similar fields and functions as the Resource Card; refer to topic “Resources” on page 1 for more information.

trans-unit.source: Machine Centers are standard in Microsoft Dynamics NAV and contain no cc|project-specific information. Refer to Online Help for information about setting up new machine centers for use with cc|project.

seg-source.mrk: Machine Centers are standard in Microsoft Dynamics NAV and contain no cc|project-specific information.
Refer to Online Help for information about setting up new machine centers for use with cc|project.

trans-unit.source: Work Centers are standard in Microsoft Dynamics NAV and contain no cc|project-specific information. Refer to Online Help for information about setting up new work centers for use with cc|project.

seg-source.mrk: Work Centers are standard in Microsoft Dynamics NAV and contain no cc|project-specific information.
